name: The Hospital's Caretaker
description:
The Hospital's Caretaker

Extra distance: The game is about social distancing

Prevent the virus from spreading, apply facemasks and encourage social distancing.
This game was made for the EXTRA CREDITS GAME JAM. Made in Godot

This game is broken..

We call this version 0.9, we will try to get a not bugged version of this out after the jam

2d artist : I.O.N Prod
